mapper.select: select id, isbn, product_id, source_type, title, sub_title, sell_price, origin_price, editor_rcmmd, content__rcmmd, catalog, digest, author, author_about, foreword, media_comment, publisher, publish_time, publish_batch, size, suit_flag, paper, book_bind, print_time, tone_flag, page_count, word_count, print_sheet, booklet_count, origin_name, language, editor_name, translator_name, painter_name, comment_count, rank_name, rank_place, tags, category, relation_product, rcmmd_also_bought, rcmmd_also_browse, rcmmd_same_time, rcmmd_perhaps_like, rcmmd_book_list, create_time, update_time, del_flag from meta_book_industry_info where id = #{id} and del_flag = 0
